name: Kelowna
description: Make a bold statement with Kelowna and its uniquely geometric tortoiseshell frame. Its pink-mauve gradient lenses add a touch of modernity and sophistication to your look.

name: Regina
description: Make your friends envious with these new chic frames. With a modern and elegant design, these frames will add a touch of luxury to your look. Featuring a versatile and timeless design, these frames are perfect for all occasions.

name: Fenrir
description: Choose Fenrir and its intense black design for a bold and modern style. Its dark lenses ensure optimal protection while adding a touch of mystery to your look.

name: Navy
description: Navy: Black rectangular elegance with unmatched UV protection. Be bold, be protected.

name: Wonka
description: Succumb to Wonka and its translucent blue frame that evokes freshness and modernity. Its dark lenses ensure optimal protection while adding a touch of sophistication to your style.

name: Valo
description: Fall for Valo and its timeless black frame, perfect for an elegant and versatile look. Its dark lenses offer reliable sun protection while enhancing your everyday style.

name: Stanmore
description: Assert your style with the tortoiseshell Stanmore glasses, a perfect fusion of timeless elegance and natural charm, offering a distinctive look.

name: Lybster
description: Assert your style with the Lybster sunglasses, combining a black acetate frame and tinted lenses. Unisex and trendy, they are perfect for those who love to stand out with elegance.

name: Allicante
description: Discover Allicante, round sunglasses in black acetate with white details and tinted lenses. Their unisex frame and edgy shape add a timeless and bold touch to your style.

name: Blossom
description: Radiate with elegance thanks to Blossom: these unisex gold metal sunglasses offer tinted lenses for a chic and trendy look, ideal for complementing your style with a touch of glamour.
